publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-1602.2 Sarah Boyack: Scotland’s Marine Environment—As an amendment to motion (S3M-1602) in the name of Richard Lochhead, insert at end "calls on the Scottish Government to accelerate the timetable for the Marine Bill, and further calls on Scottish Ministers to work constructively with the UK Government and other administrations to ensure that an integrated and joined-up approach to new legislation and its implementation are achieved." Supported by: Karen Gillon*
